synopsis.text: Unaired and filled with excitement, the 13th episode of Akuma no Riddle takes viewers on an unforgettable adventure! Stranded on an abandoned island, the Black Class finds themselves in the midst of a thrilling survival game. The objective? Seize Haru, a task that Tokazu is determined not to fail. Amidst the chaos, the girls engage in a daring game of stealing a pin from Haru's swimsuit, with the winner granted their heart's deepest desire. As wardrobe mishaps reach an all-time high, it's up to Tokazu to safeguard Haru's dignity. This unaired episode, initially screened in Tokyo City on November 22, 2014, was officially released with the seventh Blu-ray/DVD volume on December 17, 2014. Prepare for a heart-pounding, unseen adventure in this special episode of Akuma no Riddle!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
